title: Statement from the Press Secretary on Executive Office Building | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




January 25, 2009

 



Statement from the Press Secretary on Executive Office Building




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  __________________________________________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release January 25, 2009   The following statement is from White House Press Secretary Robert Gibbs:   Early this afternoon, the D.C. Fire Department was called to the Executive Office Building in response to reports of smoke on the 4th floor. A limited number of staff were temporarily evacuated and have now returned to their offices. There were no injuries and no apparent damage to the building.
